languages.text: Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.
languages.original_text: Когда союзник начинает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} (в том числе дополнительный) на соседней клетке с {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицером{/g}, этот союзник получает {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an ally starts a turn (including any extra turns) adjacent to the Leader, that ally gains additional movement points equal to <u>(Leader's FEL bonus)/2</u>.
Whenever an ally starts a turn (including any extra turns) adjacent to the Leader, that ally gains additional movement points equal to <u>(Leader's FEL bonus / 2)</u>.

Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the Leader, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

languages.text: Когда союзник начинает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} (в том числе дополнительный) на соседней клетке с {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицером{/g}, этот союзник получает {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник начинает ход (в том числе дополнительный) на соседней клетке с лидером, этот союзник получает <u>(бонус ОБЩ лидера / 2)</u> ОП дополнительно.
Когда союзник начинает ход (в том числе дополнительный) на соседней клетке с лидером, этот союзник получает <u>(бонус ОБЩ лидера / 2)</u> ОП дополнительно.

Когда союзник начинает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} (в том числе {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный{/g}) на соседней клетке с лидером, этот союзник получает {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно.

languages.text: 当任意盟友{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时（包括{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}），若是该盟友与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}相邻，则该盟友会额外获得{uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

traits.locale_text: 当任意盟友{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时（包括{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}），若是该盟友与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}相邻，则该盟友会额外获得{uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
当任意盟友{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时（包括{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}），若是该盟友与领袖相邻，则该盟友会获得额外的{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于{uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}。

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado empieza un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} (incluidos los {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}) adyacente al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g}, ese aliado gana tantos {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un aliado empieza un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} (incluidos los {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}) adyacente al oficial, ese aliado gana tantos {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} adicionales como {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

Cada vez que un aliado empieza un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} (incluidos los {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}) adyacente al líder, ese aliado gana tantos {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} adicionales como {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

languages.text: Wenn ein Verbündeter einen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} (einschließlich eines {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzugs{/g}) neben dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} beginnt, erhält dieser Verbündete zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} in Höhe von {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Verbündeter einen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} (einschließlich eines {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzugs{/g}) neben dem Offizier beginnt, erhält dieser Verbündete zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} in Höhe von {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

Immer wenn ein Verbündeter eine {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} (einschließlich einer {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Extra-Runde{/g}) neben dem Anführer beginnt, erhält dieser Verbündete zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} in Höhe von {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un allié commence un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} (y compris un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}) à une position adjacente à celle de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g}, cet allié gagne un nombre supplémentaire de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} égal à {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un allié commence un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} (y compris un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}) à une position adjacente à celle du Leader, cet allié gagne un nombre supplémentaire de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} égal à <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Leader / 2)</u>.

Chaque fois qu'un allié commence un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} (y compris un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}) à une position adjacente à celle du Leader, cet allié gagne un nombre supplémentaire de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} égal à {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}に隣接する味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始したとき（{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を含む）、その味方は{uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を追加で得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}に隣接する味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始したとき（{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を含む）、その味方は{uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を追加で得る。
リーダーに隣接する味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始したとき（{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を含む）、その味方は{uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を追加で得る。

languages.text: Bir dost birim, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}'ın bitişik hücresindeyken bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tura{/g} başladığında ({g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek turlar{/g} da dâhil) {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98} kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally starts a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (including any {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}) adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}, that ally gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to {uip|MovementPoints|45e575a80a5d49a1ad9bc5ba0537fd98}.
